portfolio.title: Candiboard
portfolio.description: Platform that allows you to customize a personal advertising and affiliate marketing program for the products of your choice. Currently built using React and Flask, But I am remaking it with next.js for the commercializing platform I am considering.

portfolio.title: Issue and Project Tracking Software
portfolio.description: Projecting managing application that works similar to Jira or Workfront. Built as a Team of 4 Bootcamp classmates, using React and Flask.

portfolio.title: Minesweeper CLI game
portfolio.description: Created a working minesweeper game played in the terminal. Has a full backend for Users and highscores. Built with Python.

portfolio.title: ScrapBook
portfolio.description: Mock rudimentary instagram version created using React and json-server. No github contributions due to computer problems, only backseat coding.

portfolio.title: SeeSEC
portfolio.description: Site that fetches from an API and returns ~100,000 employees SEC Filings from ~8000 major Companies.

portfolio.title: Project #3
portfolio.description: Simple pong game I made with python, not sure how to make it playable in browser just yet
